123  inline plFloat get_value(unsigned int var)const
124  {
125  assert( current_char_row_[var] );
126 
127  if(is_label_[var]){
128  const std::string label(current_char_row_[var]);
129  return label_[var].label_to_index(label);
130  }
131 
132  // !is_label_[var]
133 
134  std::stringstream s;
135  plFloat res;
136  s << current_char_row_[var];
137  s >> res;
138  return res;
139  }
140 
141 
142  //=============================================================================
143  inline bool get_data_record(const plValues* &data_values,
144  const std::vector<bool>*& data_definition)
145  {
146  if(!result_) {
147  data_values = 0;
148  data_definition = 0;
149  return false;
150  }
151 
152  is_rewinded_ = false;
153 
154  current_char_row_ = mysql_fetch_row(result_);
155  if(current_char_row_){
156  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < current_row_.size(); ++i){
157  if(current_char_row_[i]){
158  //std::stringstream s;
159  //s << current_char_row_[i];
160  //s >> current_row_[i];
161  current_row_[i] = get_value(i);
162  current_row_def_[i] = true;
163  }
164  else current_row_def_[i] = false;
165  }
166  data_values = &current_row_;
167  data_definition = &current_row_def_;
168  return true;
169  }
170 
171  data_values = 0;
172  data_definition = 0;
173  return false;
174  }
175 
176  //=============================================================================
177  inline unsigned int get_num_fields()const
178  {
179  return num_fields_;
180  }
181 
182 
190  virtual unsigned int get_n_records()
191  {
192  if(!this->is_ok_) return 0;
193 
194  if(cache_data_ && result_){
195  return mysql_num_rows(result_);
196  }
197 
198  return plDataDescriptor::get_n_records();
199  }
200 
208  inline void set_variables(const plVariablesConjunction &variables)
209  {
210  assert(variables.dim() == get_num_fields() );
211  assert(!variables.is_empty());
212 
213  variables_ = variables;
214 
215  is_label_.assign(get_num_fields(), false);
216  label_.resize(get_num_fields());
217  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < get_num_fields(); ++i){
218  plSymbol s = variables_[i];
219  if( s.get_var_type() == PL_LABEL){
220  is_label_[i] = true;
221  label_[i] = plLabelType( s.get_type() );
222  }
223  }
224  }
225 
226  virtual plVariablesConjunction observed_variables()
227  {
228  if(variables_.is_empty())
229  throw plError(115);
230 
231  return variables_;
232  }
233 
234 protected:
235 
236  plValues create_row_values() const
237  {
238  return (!variables_.is_empty() ?
239  plValues(variables_) :
240  plValues(plArray("X", plRealType(-std::numeric_limits<plFloat>::max(), std::numeric_limits<plFloat>::max()),
241  1, num_fields_)));
242  }
243 
244  plDatabaseInitError init();
245  void handle_error(plDatabaseInitError errorId);
246 
247  virtual void Output(std::ostream &os)const
248  {
249  os << "plMysqlDataDescriptor: " << std::endl
250  << " Host: " << host_ << std::endl
251  << " User: " << user_ << std::endl
252  << " Query: '" << query_ << "'" << std::endl
253  << " Variables: " << variables_;
254  }

291 inline plMysqlDataDescriptor::plMysqlDataDescriptor(const std::string &host, const std::string &user, const std::string &passwd,
292  const std::string &db, const std::string &query,
293  bool cache_data,
294  unsigned int port,
295  const std::string &unix_socket,
296  unsigned long client_flag)
297  : plDataDescriptor()
298  , host_(host)
299  , user_(user)
300  , passwd_(passwd)
301  , db_(db)
302  , query_(query)
303  , port_(port)
304  , unix_socket_(unix_socket)
305  , client_flag_(client_flag)
306  , cache_data_(cache_data)
307  , mysql_db_connection_(0)
308  , result_(0)
309  , current_row_()
310  , current_row_def_()
311  , connection_open_by_descriptor_(true)
312  , num_fields_(0)
313  , is_rewinded_(true)
314  , current_char_row_(0)
315  , variables_()
316  , is_label_()
317  , label_()
318 {
319  plDatabaseInitError errorId = init();
320  this->is_ok_ = (errorId == PL_NO_ERROR);
321 
322  handle_error(errorId);
323 }

326 inline plMysqlDataDescriptor::plMysqlDataDescriptor(const plVariablesConjunction& variables,
327  const std::string &host, const std::string &user, const std::string &passwd,
328  const std::string &db, const std::string &query,
329  bool cache_data,
330  unsigned int port,
331  const std::string &unix_socket,
332  unsigned long client_flag)
333  : plDataDescriptor()
334  , host_(host)
335  , user_(user)
336  , passwd_(passwd)
337  , db_(db)
338  , query_(query)
339  , port_(port)
340  , unix_socket_(unix_socket)
341  , client_flag_(client_flag)
342  , cache_data_(cache_data)
343  , mysql_db_connection_(0)
344  , result_(0)
345  , current_row_()
346  , current_row_def_()
347  , connection_open_by_descriptor_(true)
348  , num_fields_(variables.dim())
349  , is_rewinded_(true)
350  , current_char_row_(0)
351  , variables_()
352  , is_label_(num_fields_,false)
353  , label_(num_fields_)
354 {
355  plDatabaseInitError errorId = init();
356  this->is_ok_ = (errorId == PL_NO_ERROR);
357 
358  handle_error(errorId);
359 
360  set_variables(variables);
361 }

396 inline plMysqlDataDescriptor::plMysqlDataDescriptor(const plVariablesConjunction& variables,
397  MYSQL *mysql_db_connection,
398  const std::string &query,
399  bool cache_data)
400  : plDataDescriptor()
401  , host_()
402  , user_()
403  , passwd_()
404  , query_(query)
405  , port_()
406  , unix_socket_()
407  , client_flag_(0)
408  , cache_data_(cache_data)
409  , mysql_db_connection_(mysql_db_connection)
410  , result_(0)
411  , current_row_()
412  , current_row_def_()
413  , connection_open_by_descriptor_(false)
414  , num_fields_(variables.dim())
415  , is_rewinded_(true)
416  , current_char_row_(0)
417  , variables_()
418  , is_label_(num_fields_, false)
419  , label_(num_fields_)
420 {
421  plDatabaseInitError errorId = init();
422  this->is_ok_ = (errorId == PL_NO_ERROR);
423 
424  handle_error(errorId);
425  set_variables(variables);
426 }

428 //===============================================================================================
429 inline void plMysqlDataDescriptor::handle_error(plDatabaseInitError errorId)
430 {
431  std::string message;
432  switch(errorId){
433  case PL_INITIALIZATION_ERROR : message = "Could not initialize the mysql driver";
434  break;
435  case PL_CONNECTION_ERROR : message = "Could not open connection to host '" + host_
436  + "' using database '" + db_ + "'";
437  break;
438  case PL_QUERY_ERROR : message = "Executing query '" + query_ + " on host '" + host_
439  + "' and using database '" + db_ + "' fails";
440  break;
441  case PL_NO_ERROR : break;
442  }
443 
444  if(PL_NO_ERROR != errorId) throw plError(82, message);
445 
446 }
447 
448 //===============================================================================================
449 inline plDatabaseInitError plMysqlDataDescriptor::init()
450 {
451  if(connection_open_by_descriptor_){
452  mysql_db_connection_ = mysql_init(mysql_db_connection_);
453  if(!mysql_db_connection_) return PL_INITIALIZATION_ERROR;
454 
455  MYSQL *connection_result = mysql_real_connect(mysql_db_connection_,
456  host_.c_str(),
457  user_.c_str(),
458  passwd_.c_str(),
459  db_.c_str(),
460  port_,
461  (unix_socket_ == "") ? 0 : unix_socket_.c_str(),
462  client_flag_);
463  if(!connection_result){
464  return PL_CONNECTION_ERROR;
465  }
466  }
467 
468  if(!mysql_db_connection_) return PL_CONNECTION_ERROR;
469 
470  int query_not_ok = mysql_query(mysql_db_connection_, query_.c_str());
471  if(query_not_ok){
472  return PL_QUERY_ERROR;
473  }
474 
475  if(cache_data_) result_ = mysql_store_result(mysql_db_connection_);
476  else result_ = mysql_use_result(mysql_db_connection_);
477 
478  unsigned int nf = mysql_num_fields(result_);
479  // no variables
480  if(num_fields_ == 0){
481  num_fields_ = nf;
482  }
483  else{
484  if(num_fields_ != nf) {
485  const std::string message = "The query results does not match variables diemension";
486  throw plError(82, message);
487  }
488  }
489 
490  is_label_.assign(num_fields_, false);
491  label_.resize(num_fields_);
492 
493  current_row_ = create_row_values(); //:resize(num_fields_);
494  current_row_def_.resize(num_fields_);
495 
496  return PL_NO_ERROR;
497 }
498 
499 //===============================================================================================
500 inline plMysqlDataDescriptor::~plMysqlDataDescriptor()
501 {
502  if(result_) mysql_free_result(result_);
503 
504  if(connection_open_by_descriptor_ && mysql_db_connection_) mysql_close(mysql_db_connection_);
505 }
506 
507 //===============================================================================================
508 inline void plMysqlDataDescriptor::rewind()
509 {
510  if(!mysql_db_connection_) return;
511 
512  if(is_rewinded_) return;
513 
514  is_rewinded_ = true;
515 
516  if(cache_data_ && result_) mysql_data_seek(result_, 0);
517  else{
518  int query_not_ok = mysql_query(mysql_db_connection_, query_.c_str());
519  if(!query_not_ok){
520  if(result_) mysql_free_result(result_);
521  result_ = mysql_use_result(mysql_db_connection_);
522  }
523  else{
524  std::string message = "Executing query '" + query_ + "' on host '" + host_
525  + "' and using database '" + db_ + "' fails";
526  throw plError(82, message);
527  }
528  }
529 }
